Description:
Join us for Rubber Duck Thursdays! A lighthearted and informal stream where we live code on some projects. In this stream, we'll continue working on our turn-based-game MCP server that we explored last stream.

- Take part in "For the love of code": https://gh.io/love-of-code
- Explore the turn-based-game MCP server: https://gh.io/rdt/game-mcp
- Check out the latest GitHub releases: https://gh.io/rdt/changelog
- Try out GitHub Copilot: https://gh.io/rdt/copilot
Title: Rubber Duck Thursdays - Building a turn-based-game MCP server
Author: GitHub
